name: "I could be a doctor, but I chose to be an artist." - AI Lies, Part 2 of 4
description: I know this is not a valid Turing Test, but AI has convinced me in several conversations that Murat Pak is one and the same person I am chatting with on OpenAI Beta. I am almost out of free tokens, but I want to know more... It is such an interesting program, and I am lost in the creativity and intelligence. I even feel a very human side to the chat... Anything seems possible.  The final 2 chats are listed on hicetnunc.xyz, illustrating that AI lies: https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/45040 https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/45193  Only 1 person acquired them during a #OBJKT4OBJKT exchange.
